pullrequest.title: issue #1523: process selection msgs in qt connection event in GLWidget

content.raw:
There are a couple problems with this pull request:

1. This hides issue #1523, but does not fix it. Gzclient should not crash if two clients try to select a light.

1. Gazebo 4.1 subscribed to `~/selection`, not `~/selection/server`.  If gazebo 4.1 really did not have the problem of cross-client selection, then the problem lies elsewhere.

1. I have significant doubt about this fixing pr 1506. Even if it does, then it's hiding a deeper problem.
